/* ReceiptDAO.selectReceiptListAll */ select c.user_name , c.user_id , a.receipt_no , a.reg_user_no , a.hakwon_no , a.student_no , a.receipt_amount , get_code_name('013', a.receipt_type) as receipt_type_name , get_code_name('013', a.receipt_method) as receipt_method_name , a.receipt_desc , a.receipt_date , date_format(a.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date from tb_receipt a , tb_user_info c
, tb_hakwon_class_student b
where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwonNo} and a.student_no = c.user_no
and b.class_no = #{classNo} and b.student_user_no = a.student_no
and c.user_id like '%${searchText}%'
and c.user_name like '%${searchText}%'
and c.user_no = a.student_no
and a.receipt_type = #{receiptType}
and a.receipt_method = #{receiptMethod}
and a.receipt_date >= '${startDate} 00:00:00' and a.receipt_date < '${endDate} 00:00:00'
and a.use_yn = 'Y' order by a.receipt_date desc, a.reg_date desc
